name: Early Years Provider (Non-maintained)
label: Early Years Provider
definition: Early years provider with no GIAS URN (for example private nursery, independent early years providers and childminders).

name: LA Nursery School
label: Early Years School
definition: From GIAS

name: Mainstream Maintained Schools and Academies
label: Mainstream Maintained
definition: Maintained mainstream schools (including foundation schools) and mainstream academies (including free schools).

name: Mainstream Independent Schools
label: Mainstream Independent
definition: Independent mainstream schools.

name: Resourced Provision
label: Resourced Provision
definition: Resourced provision in mainstream school.

name: SEN Units
label: SEN Units
definition: SEN Unit

name: Maintained Special Schools and Academies
label: Maintained Special
definition: Maintained special schools and academies.

name: Non-maintained Special Schools
label: Non-maintained Special
definition: Non-maintained special schools.

name: Independent Special Schools
label: Independent Special
definition: Independent special schools.

name: AP / PRU
label: AP / PRU
definition: Alternative provision or Pupil Referral Unit.

name: Sixth Form Centre/College
label: Sixth Form Centre/College
definition: This category includes sixth form centres and colleges: those attending sixth forms within secondary schools should not be included here.

name: General Further Education
label: General Further Education
definition: This includes General Further Education & tertiary colleges, special colleges (agriculture, horticulture, art & design and performing arts) and specialist designated colleges. Further Education courses studied in Higher Education institutions should also be included here.

name: Specialist Post 16
label: Specialist Post 16
definition: Specialist post-16 institutions (SPIs) provide education provision and learning support for students with high needs where provision cannot be made within mainstream educational settings.

name: Secure Units and Academies
label: Secure Units
definition: Secure units and academies secure 16 to 19.

name: Other Establishments
label: Other Establishments
definition: Other establishment types.

name: Other LA Arrangements (inc. EOTAS)
label: Other LA Arrangements
definition: Other – arrangements made by the local authority in accordance with section 61 of the 2014 Act, ("Special educational provision otherwise than in schools, post-16 institutions etc", commonly referred to as EOTAS) - for example therapy that is special educational provision for a child and where it would be inappropriate to provide this in any school etc.

name: Other Parent/Person Arrangements (exc. EHE)
label: Other Parent/Person Arrangements
definition: Other – alternative arrangements made by parents or young person in accordance with section 42(5) of the 2014 Act, excluding those who are subject to elective home education (for example, where parents have chosen to arrange and pay for an independent school placement).

name: Elective Home Education
label: Elective Home Education
definition: Elective home education – alternative arrangements made by parents or young person in accordance with section 42(5) of the 2014 Act for elective home education.

name: Not in Education, Employment or Training
label: NEET
definition: Not in education, employment, or training (aged 16-25).

name: Not in Education or Training - Ceasing
label: NIEC
definition: Not in education or training – Notice to cease issued.

name: Not in Education or Training - Other
label: NIEO
definition: Not in education or training – Other – Where this is used, the local authority will be prompted for further information in COLLECT, for example, transferred into the local authority with an EHC plan and awaiting placement.

name: Other
label: Other
definition: Other – Includes where a type of setting is specified in the EHC plan (e.g., special school) but no specific setting is named. Where this is used, the local authority will be prompted for further information in COLLECT.

name: Unknown
label: Unknown
definition: CYP has an open EHCP but no placement details.
